title: Colorado National Monument: 5th Grade
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Field Trips     5th Grade                  5th Grade       Download: 5th Grade Programs Example Field Trip Schedules Note: Actual Field Trip schedules will depend upon the number of students, ranger availability, time available for the field trip and length of programs chosen.  Program Description Earth Changes in No Thoroughfare Canyon (5 Miles, 4 Hours) On a Ranger-guided hike to the first waterfall in No Thoroughfare Canyon students will discover the amazing forces that have shaped and carved the canyons in this area. They will see evidence of plate tectonics and faulting, weathering and erosion and ancient mountain building as they explore how Earth changes create a landscape. Science 3.1, 3.2
